ows:ServiceIdentification.ows:Title: 1998 Assessment of Undiscovered Deposits of Gold, Silver, Copper, Lead, and Zinc in the United States
ows:ServiceIdentification.ows:Abstract: Estimates of the number and size of undiscovered mineral deposits containing gold, silver, copper, lead, and zinc in the US, by type of deposit.

ows:Keywords.ows:Keyword: metallic mineral resources; natural resource assessment; gold; silver; copper; lead; zinc

ows:ServiceProvider.ows:ProviderName: U.S. Geological Survey Mineral Resources Program
